
## Generic Method to Use <code>shinystan</code> with <code>idealstan</code> {.unnumbered}


### Description

A generic function for launching <code>launch_shinystan</code>.



### Usage

<pre><code class='language-R'>launch_shinystan(object, ...)
</code></pre>


### Arguments

<table>
<tr><td style = "white-space: nowrap; font-family: monospace; vertical-align: top"><code id="object">object</code></td>
<td>
A fitted <code>idealstan</code> object.
</td></tr>
<tr><td style = "white-space: nowrap; font-family: monospace; vertical-align: top"><code id="...">...</code></td>
<td>
Other arguments passed on to underlying function
</td></tr>
</table>
